_aChangeLog.text: improved every single light entity in the map
improved basic bhop flow route and tweaked a lot of sections
fixed a lot of trigger_teleport shortcuts
complete re-texture of the whole map
improved and detailed the map soundscapes and ambience
replaced the carrot box pickup with a rotating carrot
replaced the snake on a plane with a real scary sneks
squeezed out every possbile limit above 98% in hammer
did a lot of testing and tweaking  of various stuff and elements
pretty much injected my own soul into this map

_sText:
bhop_lost_world_v2

General Map Info

After approximately 6 months of "casual" development I managed to bring this map to it's final stage. The map features adventuristic atmosphere throughout easy to medium difficulty bhops. While map is big it should keep you busy for quite some time, as it features better achievement concept. It should be possible for large variety of players to finish the map.

Map Features

  • Very big world
  • Variety of different bunny hop concepts
  • Decent difficulty scale
  • Puzzles
  • Most content is custom
  • Achievement system
  • Unique mini-game
  • Special rewards
  • Custom soundscapes
Extra Notes
My hopes are that you will enjoy playing this map as much as I enjoyed making it. The v2 update took total of 2 weeks full time development. Enjoy
